glsa.title: FreeRADIUS: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in FreeRADIUS can lead to arbitrary code execution or Denial of Service by authenticated users.

background.p: FreeRADIUS is an open source RADIUS authentication server.

description.p: Large passwords can trigger a stack-based buffer overflow in FreeRADIUSâ€™s rlm_pap module when authenticating against an LDAP server.

impact.p: An authenticated user could set a specially crafted long password, possibly leading to arbitrary code execution or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
